name: greasemnk
description:
cw: distorted sex, violence, death

a short rpg by heaven's guard

set in the 10,000 arses world

duration: ~45 minutes if you're good

controls:

  • move: arrow keys/wasd
  • interact: z/spacebar
  • cancel/menu: x/esc
  • press F4 to fullscreen, F3 to scale up to screen size

try a different browser if it runs poorly on firefox
